General.Name: Monogram Orthopaedics Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: Monogram Technologies Inc. engages in developing surgical robot to enable placement of patient optimized orthopedic implants in the United States. It intends to produce and market robotic surgical equipment and related software, orthopedic implants, tissue ablation tools, navigation consumables, and other miscellaneous instrumentation for use in reconstructive joint replacement procedures. The company was formerly known as Monogram Orthopaedics, Inc. and changed its name to Monogram Technologies Inc. in May 2024. Monogram Technologies Inc. was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Austin, Texas.
General.Address: 3913 Todd Lane, Austin, TX, United States, 78744
